title: [Large-scale] Hybrid Architectural Design Studio: Practice-based Projects with Blended Learning Reflecting Socio-technical Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational architectural design knowledge and basic CAD software proficiency, with elementary understanding of design considering socio-historical contexts
context.additional_context: Hybrid (in-person/remote) professional development for practitioners. Features real-time digital collaboration, asynchronous feedback systems, and project-based learning integrating social responsibility and urban planning concepts through community development case studies.

learning_goals: Independently perform hybrid architectural design processes at ≥80% proficiency using digital tools (3D modeling, BIM software) in blended learning environments, deriving design solutions reflecting urban spatial planning and societal needs

Complete team-based design projects through face-to-face/remote collaboration scenarios, incorporate ≥3 rounds of online platform feedback, and experience design processes considering citizen participation and community requirements

Analyze post-pandemic architectural design trends to propose ≥2 design solutions integrating sustainability and technology, particularly innovative approaches merging cultural-historical contexts with modern technologies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
